alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:05PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Duval, southwestern Jim Wells and southwestern Kleberg Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1004 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Premont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Premont, Riviera Beach, Riviera, La Gloria, Ricardo, Kingsville Naval Air Station and Loyola Beach. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 692 and 708. US Highway 77 between mile markers 692 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Texas.
